newsitem.title: USA: IPO HIGHLIGHTS - DFF.N BOY.N MWY.N.
newsitem.headline: IPO HIGHLIGHTS - DFF.N BOY.N MWY.N.

text.p: The following companies debuted on Wall Street Wednesday:
-- Dominick's Supermarket Inc, up 1-5/8 to 19-5/8, which priced at the top of its range at $18 a share. The offering was increased to 8.0 million shares from 6.4 million.
Dominick's is the second largest supermarket operator in the greater Chicago metropolitan area and operates 100 stores under the Dominick's and Omni names.
-- Boykin Lodging Inc, unchanged at 20. Its 8.3 million share offering was priced at $20 a share, the low end of its range.
-- Midway Games Inc, was up 1/8 to 20-1/8. Its 5.1 million share offering was priced at $20 a share, the low end of its range. The Dallas-based company manufactures coin-operated video games.
-- Bitstream Inc, trading at 5-5/8 compared with its $6 a share pricing. The 2.1 million share offering was priced below its range of $8-10.
